name: Racing Pro
description:
Have you ever dreamt of being a Racing Professional? Now you can play Racing Pro to make your dream come true.
Improve your driving skills in career mode or select quick races in case you have only a few minutes to play.

Features:

- 4 different race tracks
- 4 vehicles with different driving characteristics
- 3 game modes: Race, Time Trial, Overturn
- Career mode with 3 x 32 events
- Realistic vehicle physics
- Touch or tilt controls with optional autogas
- Game Center support

Play the full game for free! Playing through Career mode will unlock all vehicles with all optional parts.
You can also get instant access to all vehicles by In-App Purchase which also removes ads.
